ARABIC: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'Do not argue in My presence when I gave you advance warning of the Threat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not argue in My presence. I had announced the promise of doom in advance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It was said): “Do not remonstrate in My presence. I had warned you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord will say, "Do not argue in My presence; I had certainly sent you a warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will say, “Do not dispute before Me – I had already warned you of the punishment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) will say: "Dispute not in front of Me, I had already in advance sent you the threat."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He will say: Do not quarrel in My presence, and indeed I gave you the threatening beforehand:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall say, 'Dispute not before Me! For I sent you beforehand -- the threat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He saith: Contend not in My presence, when I had already proffered unto you the warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God will say, "Do not quarrel in My presence. I gave you the warning beforehand
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah will say: wrangle not in My presence, and had already proferred Unto you the threat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘Do not wrangle in My presence, for I had already warned you in advance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah will say: "Dispute not in front of Me, I had already, in advance, sent you the threat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Allah) will say: 'Do not dispute before Me. I sent you a warning beforehand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “Do not feud in My presence—I had warned you in advance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:28] He, exalted be He, will say, ‘Do not dispute in My presence, in other words, disputing is of no use here, for I had already given you, in [the life of] the world, the threat, of chastisement in the Hereafter should you not believe, and so it is [now] inevitable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He saith) Allah says to them: (Contend not in My presence, when I had already proffered unto you the warning) I have informed you in the Scripture with which the Messenger was sent about this Day.
